forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog between 9pm and 10pm, then patchy fog and a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 3am, then patchy fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 3am and 5am, then patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy, with a low around 67. East wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms likely before 8am, then patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 11am, then patchy fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11am and 2pm, then patchy fog and a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm. Cloudy, with a high near 73. East wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the clock strikes midnight in Boston, a shroud of patchy fog envelops the city, whispering secrets only the night can convey. This delicate veil will hover until dawn, bringing with it a texture of intrigue and the promise of imminent weather that paints the sky with shades of gray. Through the early hours, showers and thunderstorms are expected, threading their way into the fabric of the night. For those who venture out, a light jacket might provide a comfortable shield against the dampness, complemented by sensible footwear to navigate the moisture-clad streets.

As the sun rises, the day will awaken with a sense of sultry heaviness, the air thickened by the humidity and the lingering fog. With a high near 73, the promise of continuous showers and the possibility of thunder will keep activities decidedly more subdued. Optimal plans might involve curling up in a cozy café, with a good book in hand, allowing time to drift by as the world outside dances with raindrops. For those seeking a spark of creativity, an afternoon spent exploring local galleries or libraries could infuse the day with inspiration. Dress warmly enough to weather the humidity, yet simply enough to appreciate the refuge of the indoors. Embrace the atmospheric embrace of this summer day, where nature dictates a slower rhythm, inviting contemplation and quiet joys.
